thread.title: Amitabh Bachchan shares photo of ‘world’s largest Durga idol’ in Kolkata
thread.title_full: Amitabh Bachchan shares photo of ‘world’s largest Durga idol’ in Kolkata

title: Amitabh Bachchan shares photo of ‘world’s largest Durga idol’ in Kolkata
text: Amitabh Bachchan shares photo of ‘world’s largest Durga idol’ in Kolkata Monday, 19 October 2015 (6 minutes ago) Amitabh Bachchan wished fans on Durga puja and posted a photo of an 88-feet idol, said to be the biggest in the city. Amitabh Bachchan posted a photo of an 88-feet idol of Goddess Durga which is said to be the biggest in the city. Zee News 32 minutes ago - Entertainment Kolkata, Oct 18 : Megastar Amitabh Bachchan on Sunday wished fans on Durga puja and posted a photo of an 88-feet idol, said to be the biggest in the city. newKerala.com 10 hours ago - Entertainment You Might Like
